page.title: 03FORDHAM WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: In Fordham there is a Women's Institute with 36 members. The meetings are on the first Tuesday of every month except January which is the second Tuesday. They meet at Fordham village hall.The time is 7.30pm to 10.00pm.When you are 13 you are able to join the W.I. The subscription is Â£4.00 a year plus 15p for tea, coffee and a cake.The officers are elected each year. W.I.'S take part in different things like sponsored walks, bicycle rides, and dances.Also they go on outings. Sometimes the W.I.holds a jumble sale to raise money.At the beginning of every meeting they have a business talk about local and national issues.This is followed by a visiting speaker who comes in.Then they have tea, coffee and cakes, and to end the evening they have a game.
